nodes.text: The Randon Run was a trade route in the Kashyyyk Region of the Mid Rim. It passed through the Chamble, Kashyyyk, Messert, Phaseera, Rakhuuun, and Randon systems. It passed through mainly the Mytaranor sector, except for the Phaseera system located in the Lantillian sector. The run also intersected with the Great Kashyyyk Branch, the Durkteel Loop and Nightroad at Kashyyyk. Randon was also at its intersection with the Trax Tube, Ootmian Pabol, Pabol Sleheyron and the Dauntless Run.
